gems.name: is_dark
gems.info: Ruby Gem to detect a dark color based on luminance W3 standarts ( https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20/#relativeluminancedef ). Can detect is a hex color dark, is an Imagick pixel dark, is an Imagick pixel from a blob dark, is an area in a blob over a dark background (uses Imagick for it too). Useful to understand will be a black color text visible or not.
